So, I used to always use Imageshack but I haven't in a long time and apperently they changed their policy so to upload anymore I gotta be premium.

Yes its only like a dollar per month but with no credit card that is kinda difficult. Imgur is also amazing, but, it will only allow you to share your 200 or 250 most recent photos before it stops showing them on like direct link forums due to band with. Thats great and all but what if you have a lot of forum posts showing a lot of pictures that are sstill active? See a problem?...

My question is what image hosting site is the best and what do you all prefer personally?

This one is very convenient.

http://postimage.org/
I think I am in a new kind of love!
I use flickr. I'll acknowledge it's not as convenient as imgur for posting on the forums here, but they offer lolloads of storage.
